ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Tools for linting 'GeoJSON'. Includes tools for interacting with the online tool <http://geojsonlint.com>, the 'Javascript' library 'geojsonhint' (<https://www.npmjs.com/package/geojsonhint>), and validating against a 'GeoJSON' schema via the 'Javascript' library (<https://www.npmjs.com/package/is-my-json-valid>). Some tools work locally while others require an internet connection.

Tools for linting 'GeoJSON'. Includes tools for interacting with the online tool <http://geojsonlint.com>, the 'Javascript' library 'geojsonhint' (<https://www.npmjs.com/package/geojsonhint>), and validating against a 'GeoJSON' schema via the 'Javascript' library (<https://www.npmjs.com/package/is-my-json-valid>). Some tools work locally while others require an internet connection.

name: r-geojsonlint
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.4.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-geojsonlint
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/geojsonlint_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/geojsonlint/geojsonlint_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5fa55c1bea418ad4f6fa53f5ebae62bede3ed76370c2275adb1eea448da3dd50

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-v8
    - r-crul >=0.7.0
    - r-jsonlite >=0.9.19
    - r-jsonvalidate >=1.0.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-v8
    - r-crul >=0.7.0
    - r-jsonlite >=0.9.19
    - r-jsonvalidate >=1.0.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('geojsonlint')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('geojsonlint')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ropensci/geojsonlint
  license: MIT
  summary: Tools for linting 'GeoJSON'. Includes tools for interacting with the online tool <http://geojsonlint.com>,
    the 'Javascript' library 'geojsonhint' (<https://www.npmjs.com/package/geojsonhint>),
    and validating against a 'GeoJSON' schema via the 'Javascript' library (<https://www.npmjs.com/package/is-my-json-valid>).
    Some tools work locally while others require an internet connection.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - xhochy

# Package: geojsonlint
# Title: Tools for Validating 'GeoJSON'
# Description: Tools for linting 'GeoJSON'. Includes tools for interacting with the online tool <http://geojsonlint.com>, the 'Javascript' library 'geojsonhint' (<https://www.npmjs.com/package/geojsonhint>), and validating against a 'GeoJSON' schema via the 'Javascript' library (<https://www.npmjs.com/package/is-my-json-valid>). Some tools work locally while others require an internet connection.
